<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the portal color theme specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"theme":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"The custom color theme ID.","format":"int32","example":1},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The custom color theme name.","nullable":true,"example":"blue"},"main":{"type":"object","properties":{"accent":{"type":"string","description":"The accent color.","nullable":true,"example":"#4781D1"},"buttons":{"type":"string","description":"The button color.","nullable":true,"example":"#5299E0"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The custom color theme color parameters.","title":"CustomColorThemesSettingsColorItem"},"text":{"type":"object","properties":{"accent":{"type":"string","description":"The accent color.","nullable":true,"example":"#4781D1"},"buttons":{"type":"string","description":"The button color.","nullable":true,"example":"#5299E0"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The custom color theme color parameters.","title":"CustomColorThemesSettingsColorItem"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The custom color theme settings.","title":"CustomColorThemesSettingsItem"},"selected":{"type":"integer","description":"Specifies the optional value indicating the selected custom color theme.","format":"int32","nullable":true,"example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the portal theme settings.","title":"CustomColorThemesSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
